post:
Domains at Cost has a wide portfolio of hosting services such as Shared hosting, E commerce Hosting, WordPress Hosting and as of today VPS Plans! You can find Linux and Windows platforms! We also have domain registrations, and SSL's.  

Our New OpenVZ VPS Server specifications and pricing details are as below  

**VPS Features:**

*2 CPU cores   
*768 MB ram   
*30 GB Disk Space   
*1000 GB Bandwidth   
*100mbps   
*Free SolusVM   
*full root access   

Monthly Price: $5/month  
  
Payment methods  
1. PayPal  
2. Credit Card

Additional information can be found on our [website](http://domainsatcost.com/vps-hosting/openvz-vps.php).
